li.label: ch boxer
li.description: Excels at unarmed combat. When unarmed, melee damage becomes absurd.

li.label: ch tex
li.description: Excels with revolvers. While wielding one, accuracy and handling become absurd.

li.label: ch tank
li.description: Extremely resistant to injury. Damage is heavily reduced. Movement is less impacted by injury.

li.label: ch green thumb
li.description: Plants near me grow faster and ignore darkness and temperature penalties.

li.label: ch doc
li.description: All surgeries performed by this pawn succeed. Tend quality is always excellent, including self-tend.

li.label: ch ascendant
li.description: This pawn embodies generational ascent. They are always fertile, deeply bonded with children, and nearby children grow and learn at an accelerated pace.

li.label: ch beastmaster
li.description: Absolute dominion over animals. Taming always succeeds. Training never provokes revenge and decays far more slowly. Herd animals near this pawn thrive and reproduce rapidly. Wild animals that linger nearby become calm and submissive.
